easy.q: I have four legs but I cannot walk. I help you sit when you eat. What am I?
easy.hint: You sit on me at the table.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a small number and its opposite added letters.

hard.q: Two people start at the same point. One moves 3 steps north, the other 3 steps east. Without turning, how can they end up on the same spot?
hard.a: They started from different times? Not enough info.
hard.hint: Consider different paths or meanings of 'same spot'.
